commands: su ssm-user --shell bash -c 'export KUBECONFIG=/home/ssm-user/sample-cluster/sample-cluster-eks-a-cluster.kubeconfig; cd /home/ssm-user; set -o pipefail; kubectl apply -f ./amp-adot-sa.yaml'

su ssm-user --shell bash -c 'export KUBECONFIG=/home/ssm-user/sample-cluster/sample-cluster-eks-a-cluster.kubeconfig; cd /home/ssm-user; set -o pipefail; eksctl anywhere delete package amp-adot --cluster sample-cluster; eksctl anywhere create packages -f ./amp-adot-curated-packages.yaml'
